ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bolster Belt
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, ok, I mean wth?  You had a Runed Bolster Belt Handy, but the only weapon you had around was a scythe?  This is either the funniest necro soloing story I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, ok, I mean wth? You had a Runed Bolster Belt Handy, but the only weapon
you had around was a scythe? This is either the funniest necro soloing
story I have ever heard or I need a vacation.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:38 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Runed Bolster Belt


Tested this back on Saturday (yes, the one from Vox). Only
weapon we had handy was a scythe, so that's what we used.

time swings delay %chg delay %chg speed
Scythe - - 50.5 - -
RBB 76.7 20 38.35 -24.06% +31.68%
RBB+Anthem 57.9 20 28.95 -42.67% +74.44%

This matches up almost exactly with the results for the
mithril 2h sword, so I suspect the RBB, COF, and haste weapons
all operate the same way.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
